name: Earth 2167
description:
The year is 2167, and earth has too much space trash orbiting it. SpaceY, an international space  business, has developed a new type of robot (white block) which is tasked with hoovering up space junk (blue blocks), all whilst avoiding citizen vehicles (red blocks). 

Made as part of SplashJam 2017, much more was planned, but with the northern lights and other activities distracting from game making, this is all that was accomplished by myself. 

How much trash can you gather before killing too many civilians?
